column1: * 1923 – Swedish author and translator Roland Adlerberth is born.
* 1937 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Simonne dArdenne (21 September 1937).
* 1937 – J.R.R. Tolkien signs copies of The Hobbit and sends them to E.V. Gordon
* 2007 – The History of The Hobbit is published in the United States.
